tool_description: Random word generator full of unique, interesting words. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/randomword
title: Random Word by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/randomword
api_list.description: API Ninjas Random Word API endpoint. Returns a random word.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Type of word. Possible values are: noun, verb, adjective, adverb.
